document_data.name: Fellows of Free Fate
document_data.mainbody: The '''Fellows of Free Fate''', known locally as the '''Triffs''', was a sect of [[Tymora]]n clergy within the [[Church of Tymora|greater church]] who dedicated themselves to fight against the actions of [[Beshaba]]n followers.
document_data.Activities: The group specifically their efforts to act in opposition of the Beshaban order of [[assassin]]s known as the [[Black Fingers]].
document_data.Members: Any [[priest]] of Tymora was free to join the sect so long as they received the blessing of a single senior Fellow.
